name: The Biggering
description:
Build for the Epic Mega Jam 2020! 

Our intrepid intergalactic entrepreneur is looking at hoping between planets to bigger the size of their company. Not caring about the destruction being left behind them. How large can the entrepreneur bigger the company before nature fights back. 

Traverse between procedurally generated worlds mining resources but watch out. The more buildings you place down the more the planet fights back dealing more damage to your structures as your collection of factory's grows larger. 

Team Name:

Herr Trigger
